item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:49, topic:235521”][quote author=nueb35 link=topic=310609.msg2485603#msg2485603 date=1223784355]

too bad i cant install any sort of linux because i dont know where to get any sort of linux which is not ubuntu.

Offtopic, but that is the most horrible excuse I’ve ever heard. Have a gander at http://distrowatch.com/ If you are new at it I would go with Kubuntu, otherwise debian is awesome.

well the actual problem is that the ubuntu i downloaded was too big for the cd i had, which was 700mb ill give kubuntu a try
[/quote]

Ubuntu or Kubuntu will send you a CD, also both of them fit on regular CDs, not DVDs. So I don’t know what you downloaded. Download it here:
http://www.kubuntu.org/getkubuntu/download[/quote]

i downloaded it straight off the site, and download the program they said to download ino order to burn it (its on the burn howto link), ill apply for a cd and see what happens

Read full topic

the field name

which is very, very fucking bad. thing is, all the new ‘updater people’ are idiots who leeched 999999% of Ollie’s code. it’s fucking dumb, considering the updater sucked.[/quote]

but yes, nothings changed.

item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:34, topic:235521”][quote author=Cheese_Police link=topic=310609.msg2483730#msg2483730 date=1223692130]
Not that, on windows the terminal has (virtually) no color support. Cygwin is a bit better, but it still sucks.
[/quote]
If by “virtually” you mean it only supports 16 colours…
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.console.foregroundcolor.aspx
I will use reflector on that class, I want to know how it does it.

kernel32.dll
BOOL WINAPI SetConsoleTextAttribute(
__in HANDLE hConsoleOutput,
__in WORD wAttributes
);
So why can’t Java do this?[/quote]Java is too cool to natively support something so useless.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:36, topic:235521”][quote author=nueb35 link=topic=310609.msg2483793#msg2483793 date=1223693854]

gl doing colours in a textfile

who here prints their outout onto a file?
[/quote]someone that isnt a retarded faggot… oh i see your point

there isnt any reason why you cant build a report in html/rtf/whatever[/quote]
You can do colors on html and rtf?
HTML is obvious, but rtf is a bit more complicated

{
   \rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1043
   {
      \fonttbl
      {
         \f0\fswiss\fcharset0 Arial;
      }
   }
   {
      \colortbl ;
      \red255\green0\blue0;
      \red0\green255\blue0;
   }
   \viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\f0\fs20 Test output:\par
   \cf2 Class \cf1 Client \cf2 : \cf1 client\par
}

basicly shows:

Test output:
Class Client : client

The code can be understand if you try, all you need to know is the the color table. Which can be refferenced by \cf1 (for color on index 1)
Line ends are simple \par
Bold is \b and \b0 for end bold
Cursive = \i and \i0 for end cursive
Underlined = \ul and \ulnone for end underlined.

Pretty sure you can find this info somewhere on google…

Read full topic

[/quote]

who here prints their outout onto a file?[/quote]someone that isnt a retarded faggot… oh i see your point

there isnt any reason why you cant build a report in html/rtf/whatever

Read full topic
